Period.description:
Represents a period of time expressed in human chronological terms: hours, days,
weeks, months and so on.

nanoseconds.description: Gets the number of nanoseconds within this period.

ticks.description: Gets the number of ticks within this period.

milliseconds.description: Gets the number of milliseconds within this period.

seconds.description: Gets the number of seconds within this period.

minutes.description: Gets the number of minutes within this period.

hours.description: Gets the number of hours within this period.

days.description: Gets the number of days within this period.

weeks.description: Gets the number of weeks within this period.

months.description: Gets the number of months within this period.

years.description: Gets the number of years within this period.

hasTimeComponent.description: Returns whether or not this period contains any non-zero-valued time-based properties (hours or lower).

hasDateComponent.description: Returns whether or not this period contains any non-zero date-based properties (days or higher).

JWT.description: Using the Authorization header with the Bearer scheme.
